info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Marmorino™ Classico is a lime-based, decorative marble finish that can be used on interior surfaces. Its watertight and antibacterial properties make it an ideal choice of luxurious living spaces. The smooth, low-luster finish blended with gentle light contrasts create a sense of depth and exquisite detail to our modern day walls. BOYSEN®® Marmorino™ Primer is an acrylic, water-based special primer for Marmorino™ Classico. The resulting course film eases the application of the succeeding plaster enabling the required thickness. BOYSEN®® Marmorino™ Wax is a special, water-based natural wax for the protection of lime-based mineral plasters like Marmorino™ Classico. A coat of this product renders a washable surface that is water-resistant but breathable.

info.title: PRINCIPAL USES
info.body: It is ideal for interior concrete and drywall surfaces.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: New Concrete
info.body: Allow new concrete to dry for 14-28 days under normal weather conditions before painting. Surface to be painted should be clean and dry, free from oil, grease, dust, dirt, contaminants, and all loose grit and mortar.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: Drywall Substrates
info.body: Install and secure joints as per manufacturer's recommendations.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.subtitle: STEP 1
info.body: The surface, whether previously painted or bare, should be properly primed using Marmorino™ Primer B‑5005. (Coverage: 30-35 sq. m. per 4-Liters per coat)

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.subtitle: STEP 2
info.body:
Using the Marmorino™ Trowel, liberally apply a coat of Marmorino™ Classico mixed with the desired Marmorino™ Toner onto the properly prepared surface.  (Coverage: 40 sq. m. per 24-kg pail)
Apply a second coat of the colored Marmorino™ Classico and keep ridges and trowel imperfections to a minimum. Allow this to dry overnight until wet spots are no longer visible. (Coverage: 80 sq. m. per 24-kg pail)

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.subtitle: STEP 3
info.body: Spot apply a third coat of colored Marmorino™ Classico to achieve the desired marble pattern. Allow setting for a few minutes only. (Coverage 240 sq.m. per 24-kg pail)

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.subtitle: STEP 4
info.body: For polishing, press in some more Marmorino™ Classico using the trowel for surface leveling. This is to achieve a more uniform and smoother finish. Let dry for another 48 hours.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.subtitle: STEP 5
info.body: Once Marmorino™ has dried, use a soft sponge to apply the Natural Wax Protection. Work the wax into the surface and wipe any excess fluid off. Cover about 1 square meter at a time for better control over the design.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.subtitle: STEP 6
info.body: Finally, smooth over the surface using a soft, lint-free cloth.
